package.name: API2Cart_Magento_B2B_Connector
package.summary: Establish the connection between your B2B system and Magento online stores with no additional information needed. Use the connector to make synchronization of such client store data as orders, products, categories, and customers possible.
package.description:
The plugin allows to set up the link between B2B software such as inventory and order management systems, e-mail marketing services, mobile app building software, etc. and Magneto stores in order to get, synchronize and manipulate various store data such as customers, orders, products, categories, prices, abandoned carts, tracking numbers, etc.
Key Features: -establishes a secure connection with Magento stores -allows to access store databases to retrieve, add, delete, and synchronize such information as products, categories, orders, and customers -makes it possible to use this store data to do the following: * automate inventory and order management, accounting, billing, and other business processes * track order, inventory, and other data updates * arrange it into informative reports, widgets and dashboards * generate invoices and shipping labels * create data feeds and send them multichannel * reflect information updates into mobile stores and across international listings * collect abandoned cart data and run order recovery e-mail campaigns * send notifications -32-symbol key security -no client FTP credentials needed
Please note. Having this plugin installed is not enough to retrieve and manipulate store data. It only serves as a connector that works via API2Cart, which is a service that provides a unified access to the databases of Magento and 30+ other shopping platforms via one API.
